name: Slimon State
description:
In this puzzle game, the main character Slimon, a slime-like creature, has escaped from a laboratory, and needs to collect the pieces of a broken key, in order to free himself from his prison.  Meanwhile, Slimon’s enemies, the crafty scientists, are on the prowl for Slimon, along with environmental hazards he must avoid, making his escape much harder.  

Slimon must use his natural adhesive quality to stick and climb across walls, and change his viscosity to slide around pipes. Slimon’s objective is to locate and collect the key pieces, and reach the door to escape!
